title: Checkout Started Event Data
description: Data payload for the ecommerce.checkout_started event. Fired when a user initiates the checkout process.

orderId.description: The order or transaction identifier, if available at checkout initiation.

total.description: The total monetary value of the checkout.

currency.description: ISO 4217 3-letter currency code for the transaction (e.g. USD, EUR, GBP).

products.description: The list of products included in the checkout.

coupon.description: The coupon code applied to the checkout, if any.
